glsa.title: strongSwan: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been found in strongSwan, possibly resulting in Denial of Service or a bypass in authentication restrictions.

background.p: strongSwan is an IPSec implementation for Linux.

description.p: A NULL pointer dereference and an error in the IKEv2 implementation have been found in strongSwan.

impact.p: A remote attacker could create a Denial of Service condition or bypass security restrictions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All strongSwan users should upgrade to the latest version:
